data.title: Thoughts on building a SageTV channel?
data.meta_description: Hi there. I'm not sure if SageTV is known much on this board. Basically, it's a DVR / media center software that also supported hardware extenders. Well, it was just announced that Google is purchasing SageTV ( http://sagetv.com/index.html ) and
data.text:
Hi there.

I'm not sure if SageTV is known much on this board. Basically, it's a DVR / media center software that also supported hardware extenders. Well, it was just announced that Google is purchasing SageTV (http://sagetv.com/index.html ) and they've closed down all hardware and software sales. I think a lot of people (me included) are looking for hardware extenders to support our servers.

How difficult is developing a channel for Roku? Do you think something like this is possible?

I saw that Plex now has a Roku channel, which is what got me thinking of this as a solution for Sage.

Roku 1 XDS connected via ethernet

Roku LT via WIFI

Apple Airport Extreme
